text: 2059 (MMLIX) will be . == Predicted and scheduled events == * January 1 â€“ Books, movies, and other works published in 1963 will enter the public domain in the United States. * January 29 - 100th anniversary of the Sleeping Beauty. * May 8 - 100th anniversary of the Little Caesars. * November 18 - 100th anniversary of the Ben-Hur. * November 19 - 100th anniversary of the Rocky and Bullwinkle. ==Fictional events== * The anime Macross Frontier takes place in 2059. * "The Waters of Mars" episode of Doctor Who takes place in 2059.
